item.description:
March 20th is the spring equinox, which officially marks the beginning of spring. Come celebrate the transition into new season, with this special yoga & meditation class!


Just like your house needs spring cleaning, your mind could probably use a little spring cleaning itself. Wouldnâ€™t it be nice to remove the cobwebs and clutter from our minds, and start fresh with a new season? As you leave winter behind and let go of things that are weighing you down, you create space for growth and creativity.


Please join us for a 2-hour class that will incorporate simple yoga poses and guided meditation focusing on letting go of limiting beliefs and increasing your energy. This class is suitable for both beginners and advanced yoga practitioners.

Details:

Date: March 23rd from 2 to 4pm

Location: Art and Soul Yoga, 91 Hampshire St. Cambridge, MA

Price: $10

Led by Emilia Sabatowska and Sara Luvisi
item.how_to_find_us: Please see the website for directions: http://www.artsoulyoga.com/Art_%26_Soul/Directions.html
item.name: Spring into Wellness
